pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.dicom

Class Convert2PNG

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.dicom.Convert2PNG

  • public class Convert2PNG
extends Object
    Handles conversion between the images (formats) found inside a DICOM file and the PNG image format, for proper lossless web view.
    Author:
    Ant√≥nio Novo , Eduardo Pinho

    • Method Detail

      • DICOM2PNGStream

        @Deprecated
public static ByteArrayOutputStream DICOM2PNGStream(StorageInputStream dcmStream,
                                                                int frameIndex,
                                                                int transformType,
                                                                int transformParam1,
                                                                float transformParam2)
        Deprecated. 
        Reads an input DICOM file, applies a transformation to it if any, and returns the desired frame as a PNG-encoded memory stream.
        Parameters:
        dcmStream - The Dicoogle storage input Stream for the DICOM File.
        frameIndex - the index of the frame wanted (zero based).
        transformType - the transform to execute.
        transformParam1 - the param used on width and height based scales.
        transformParam2 - the param used on percentage based scales.
        Returns:
        the frame encoded in a PNG memory stream.

      • DICOM2PNGStream

        public static ByteArrayOutputStream DICOM2PNGStream(StorageInputStream dcmStream,
                                                    int frameIndex)
                                             throws IOException
        Reads an input DICOM file and returns the desired frame as a PNG-encoded memory stream.
        Parameters:
        dcmStream - The Dicoogle storage input Stream for the DICOM File.
        frameIndex - the index of the frame wanted (starting with #0).
        Returns:
        the frame encoded in a PNG memory stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the I/O operations on the images fail

      • DICOM2PNGStream

        public static ByteArrayOutputStream DICOM2PNGStream(InputStream iStream,
                                                    int frameIndex)
                                             throws IOException
        Reads an input DICOM file and returns the desired frame as a PNG-encoded memory stream.
        Parameters:
        iStream - an input stream for the DICOM File.
        frameIndex - the index of the frame wanted (starting with #0).
        Returns:
        the frame encoded in a PNG memory stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the I/O operations on the images fail

      • DICOM2ScaledPNGStream

        public static ByteArrayOutputStream DICOM2ScaledPNGStream(InputStream inStream,
                                                          int frameIndex,
                                                          int width,
                                                          int height)
                                                   throws IOException
        Reads an input DICOM file, scales it to fit in the given dimensions and returns the desired frame as a PNG-encoded memory stream.
        Parameters:
        inStream - The Dicoogle storage input Stream for the DICOM File.
        frameIndex - the index of the frame wanted (starting with #0).
        width - the maximum width of the resulting image
        height - the maximum height of the resulting image
        Returns:
        the frame encoded in a PNG memory stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the I/O operations on the images fail

      • DICOM2ScaledPNGStream

        public static ByteArrayOutputStream DICOM2ScaledPNGStream(StorageInputStream dcmStream,
                                                          int frameIndex,
                                                          int width,
                                                          int height)
                                                   throws IOException
        Reads an input DICOM file, scales it to fit in the given dimensions and returns the desired frame as a PNG-encoded memory stream.
        Parameters:
        dcmStream - The Dicoogle storage input Stream for the DICOM File.
        frameIndex - the index of the frame wanted (starting with #0).
        width - the maximum width of the resulting image
        height - the maximum height of the resulting image
        Returns:
        the frame encoded in a PNG memory stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the I/O operations on the images fail

      • getNumberOfFrames

        public static int getNumberOfFrames(StorageInputStream dcmFile)
        Retrieve the number of frames from an input DICOM file.
        Parameters:
        dcmFile - The Dicoogle storage input Stream for the DICOM File.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of frames in the image, or -1 if the operation fails

      • scaleImageByWidth

        public static BufferedImage scaleImageByWidth(BufferedImage image,
                                              int width)
        Resize a BufferedImage to the specified width, preserving the original image aspect ratio.
        Parameters:
        image - the original image to scale.
        width - the target width.
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage scaled to the target width.

      • scaleImageByHeight

        public static BufferedImage scaleImageByHeight(BufferedImage image,
                                               int height)
        Resize a BufferedImage to the specified height, preserving the original image aspect ratio.
        Parameters:
        image - the original image to scale.
        height - the target height.
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage scaled to the target height.

      • scaleImageByPercent

        public static BufferedImage scaleImageByPercent(BufferedImage image,
                                                float percent)
        Resize a BufferedImage based on the specified percentage, preserving the original image aspect ratio.
        Parameters:
        image - the original image to scale.
        percent - the percentage to scale to, 1.0 is original, 0.5 is half, 2.0 is double, etc.
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage scaled to the target percentage.

      • scaleImage

        public static BufferedImage scaleImage(BufferedImage image,
                                       int width,
                                       int height)
        Resize a BufferedImage to fit the specified dimensions, while preserving the original image aspect ratio. The image scaling procedure will guarantee that at least one of the dimensions will be equal to the maximum target.
        Parameters:
        image - the original image to scale.
        width - the maximum width of the target
        height - the maximum height of the target
        Returns:
        a copy of the image, scaled to fit into the given dimensions
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - on bad width and height dimensions
        NullPointerException - on null image
